Detailed Description

Definition in file PCIe_menu.cpp.

Function Documentation

int main (  int  argc,
char *  argv[]
) 
 

PCIe Basic Demo Entry Point. Create the driver interface object, display driver info, create the IP device objects (GPIO and EBR) and then launch the menu(). Environment variables must be set to specify the board to open.

Definition at line 124 of file PCIe_menu.cpp.

References menu().

void menu (  void   ) 
 

PCIe Basic Demo user interactive Menu. Provides the following operations:

  • c - PCI Config Registers
  • e - PCIe Extended Capabilities Registers
  • l - LED test
  • d - DIP switch setting
  • m[cf] - EBR memory test
  • i <file> - Input file to EBR memory
  • o <file> - Output EBR memory to file
  • r[bsl] [<addr> [count]]
  • w[bsl] [<addr> <data_1>...<data_n>]
  • v - version and driver info
  • t[1-5] [num] - run a debug test num times
  • q,x - exit
